sentence.text: <mark class='inner'>(It's locked.^500 I can't go there...)</mark>

(Hmm...^1000
It's locked.)

(Dear visitors...^500
The MUSEUM will close very soon.)
<mark class='distant'>(Please,^250 proceed to the nearest <mark class='clue'>EXIT</mark>.)</mark>

(Well,^250 better hurry...^500
I should check the MAP to find my way.)
<mark class='inner'>(Weird,^500 it's quiet all of a sudden...)</mark>

(Hey there!^250 Wait!^1000
Behind you...)
<mark class='distant'>(...)</mark>
<mark class='distant'>(Look at your feet!)</mark>

Yea,^250 I know what you're gonna say:^500
"A talking mouse! Bla^250 bla^250 bla..."

Look,^250 I don't have time have to explain,^500
just do as I say^250 ok?
Follow me to the next room,^500 let's go!
<mark class='inner'>(Ok...^500 What the hell was that?)</mark>
HOLD IT RIGHT THERE...
WHO DARE COME IN THIS SACRED PLACE!
YOU SHALL NOT PASS!
<mark class='distant'>(Argh!^250 Not this again <mark class='clue'>SPHINX</mark>!)</mark>
Look.^500 It's me,^250 <mark class='clue'>TERRIL</mark>!
Now let us pass,^250 please?
No.

Dammit!^1000
Ok,^500 we really need to pass.

Tell me what you want and you'll get it...^1000
Deal?

Answer my riddle,^500 and the access of...^500
Whatever you came here for^250 will be granted.

Here you go,^500
"What goes on four feet in the mor-

(Hey,^250 I know that one!^500
It's a MOUSE!)

Hrm...^500
Maybe your friend here will be worth my time.

You there...^500
I'll repeat my riddle for you...

"What goes on four feet in the morning,^500 two feet at noon,^500
and three feet in the evening?"
He won't let up pass until we've answered his riddle!
Talk to him to try again.

"What goes on four feet in the morning,^500 two feet at noon,^500
and three feet in the evening?"
Come on...^500 We can't stay here all day!

(That mouse got some nerve!^500
I shouldn't even be doing this in the first place...)
Wait,^250 is this allowed?

Hey,^250 as long as it works.^1000
(So,^250 let's see...)

.^250.^250.^250
WAIT!^500 You cheated!
<mark class='distant'>(No I didn't.)</mark>

Not you idiot!
Your friend there^250 with this strange^500 artifact of his...
It's called a phone.

I DON'T CARE WHAT IT'S CALLED!^500
You cheated and I will not let you pass through!

Come on friend,^500 remember the Alamo.^500
Everything we did together...

.^250.^250.^500Alright.^1000
One more.
One more riddle,^500 get it right^250 and I will let you go through.

No cheating this time!^500
I'm watching you!

"They are two sisters.^500
One gives birth to the other,^250 who in turn gives birth
to the first.^500
What are the two sisters?"

action.choice: The Moon and the Sun, simple.

sentence.text: It's alright.^250 Just try again!

YES!^500
Huh,^250 can we go now?

.^250.^250.^250Sure...^500
Go now,^250 out of my sight!
You may pass^250 now.

GREAT!^250 About time.
Hey,^500 good job^250 by the way.
Ok,^250 follow me!
